name: Tripzen
overview:
Tripzen is a global online travel site.

TripZen is not a store. The stated goal is not to sell anything but to provide as many options and analysis as possible for vacations and trips to make informed decisions by providing analysis based on other traveler’s opinions.

TripZen claims 5 million plus travel reviews on 5 million hotels in 2,500 plus cities.

Use our search tools to narrow hotel search based on their own criteria. Look for a specific property type such as hotel, motel, B&B, or hostel. Further narrow your search further based on amenities such as pets allowed, pool, parking, Internet, business center, room service, shuttle service, meeting rooms and more.
